name: Da Bois Demo
description:
A Game From Your Favorite Gaming Company, Hungry Entertainment Brings You, A Game Made With The Ren'Py Engine,  Da Bois Demo!  This is a game with fictional events, some real events, and totally not even close to finishing!  The name Da Bois is just its placeholder name, it will be changed once I find a name good enough for this game.  Just for the Demo there is over 250! lines of code! Now thats a lot of damage.  You can give ideas if you want!  Demo also has no spoilers to the official release of the game, and not all of the characters have their own model yet.

(Sorry If Spelling Errors)
